title: Web-Based Educational Resource System Design: A User-Centered Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic curriculum design knowledge and experience with web-based tools
context.additional_context: Development of a web-based resource system for elementary education, emphasizing content design linked to students' daily lives; verifying practical applicability through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Based on learner needs analysis, an initial design framework for a web-based educational resource system can be proposed.
Elementary social studies-integrated educational content can be developed in accordance with user-centered design principles.
The system development process can be planned and executed within limited budget and resources.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
